title: Short and Tall
description: Nine fantasy tales for tweens. An unhappy boy is granted three wishes. An intruder is almost adopted by aliens. A very old story is retold in rhyme. A spoof of another traditional story. A granny is struck by lightning A girl finds a magic crystal that changes her life. A spoof of Rapunzel A young girl saves a leopard from hunters A spoof of Saint George and the Dragon
author: Ellie B. Morris
